title: One of My favorite films!
review: I enjoyed 'The Blair Witch Project'! It wasn't really scary to me, but it was enjoyable. The ending was very suspenseful and the acting was extremely convincing. I know that many people have had negative comments about the film. All I can say is that it is a shame that they couldn't enjoy the film and give it positive reviews like others have. I can't wait to buy the DVD so that I can enjoy it as many times as I please. Thanks for taking the time to read my comments and thaughts on this great film!
